pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation and Analysis of Platform Trials with Non-Concurrent Controls // Design and analysis of flexible platform trials with non-concurrent controls. Functions for data generation, analysis, visualization and running simulation studies are provided. The implemented analysis methods are described in: Bofill Roig et al. (2022) doi:10.1186/s12874-022-01683-w, Saville et al. (2022) doi:10.1177/17407745221112013 and Schmidli et al. (2014) doi:10.1111/biom.12242.
